mapper.update: update MONITORING_REPORT set REPORTER_ID = #{reporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTER_R_NAME = #{reporterRName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTER_USER_NAME = #{reporterUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_TIME = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPLANATION = #{explanation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFICATION_TIME = #{modificationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REPORT_TITLE = #{reportTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVISER = #{reviser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLISHER = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, REPORTER_ID, REPORTER_R_NAME, REPORTER_USER_NAME, REPORT_TIME, EXPLANATION, MODIFICATION_TIME, REPORT_TITLE, AUTHOR, REVISER, CHECKER, PUBLISHER from MONITORING_REPORT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, REPORTER_ID, REPORTER_R_NAME, REPORTER_USER_NAME, REPORT_TIME, EXPLANATION, MODIFICATION_TIME, REPORT_TITLE, AUTHOR, REVISER, CHECKER, PUBLISHER from MONITORING_REPORT
